eventSupport.title: Event Support
eventSupport.professionalTitle: We have several professional event organisers and facilitators/conference designers available for an optimal experience
eventSupport.professionalDescription: If you are interested in additional support, you can add this here.
eventSupport.publicEventLabel: Public event (we will publish through our channels as well)
eventSupport.publicEventDescription: Check this box if you want your event to be promoted on our public channels and open to the community. For private events, we offer personalized white-glove service and exclusive use of the Commons with dedicated supportâ€”this premium experience includes a 30% surcharge to ensure your gathering receives our full attention and maintains the intimate atmosphere you deserve.
